channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: New Zealand: Earth's Mythical Islands
channel.desc: New Zealand was one of the last land-masses to be found and settled by people. Lush and fertile, almost everything brought here flourishes, often with surprising consequences. Told through the experiences of its native species - in particular, a charismatic and peculiar giant, flightless parrot - this is the moving story of the changing fortunes of New Zealand's wildlife, since humans first arrived.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: The team are at Tilbury Docks in Essex. Antique experts Philip Serrell and Nick Davies scour the crowd to find objects to take off to auction. Philip uncovers a World War II submariner's jacket, while Nick finds a Hollywood postcard collection. Paul Martin explores the history of the docks and the people who worked there in its heyday.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Every day this week, previous contestants Radzi Chinyanganya, Janet Ellis, Darren Harriott and Suzi Ruffell take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
channel.desc: Crossing the River Tamar via Isambard Kingdom Brunel's magnificent Royal Albert Bridge, Michael leaves Devon for Cornwall. The ruins of Tintagel Castle emerge from the mist and spray of the sea, and the legend of King Arthur is all about.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: SOS: Extreme Rescues
channel.desc: A young couple looking for a hidden hotspot are stranded in the dark, mountain rescue go old-school to find an injured walker, and an American visitor bites off more than he can chew.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Grand Tours of Scotland's Rivers
channel.desc: Paul explores the upper reaches of the mighty River Tay, beginning with a flight in a microlight over the river's source, high above Ben Lui. Returning to earth, Paul goes underground to explore an active gold mine beside the river.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life
channel.desc: Hannah gains access to a top-secret site where anonymous staff and the latest tech work to make the British passport one of the most secure documents on the planet. She reveals the World War I spy craft hidden in the pages of every passport.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Nazis, U-boats and the Battle for the Atlantic
channel.desc: Deep-sea divers hunt for the wrecks of Hitler's dreaded U-boat fleet off the north west coast of Ireland, while historians unravel the early stages of World War II's longest campaign.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Limbs in the Loch: Catching a Killer
channel.desc: Detectives want to question William Beggs, the prime suspect in the murder of 18-year-old Barry Wallace, but Beggs is on the run. As the manhunt continues, Strathclyde Police make a shocking discovery that turns the investigation on its head.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Saving Lives at Sea
channel.desc: A 999 call comes in from the young son of a windsurfer in trouble; the Mudeford crew battle 80mph winds in an increasingly desperate search.

channel.title: Miriam Margolyes Discovers New Zealand
channel.desc: Miriam Margolyes looks beyond the pristine beauty of New Zealand's South Island to understand the challenges New Zealanders face and what this says about who they are as a nation.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Disaster at Sea: The Piper Alpha Story
channel.desc: On 6 July 1988, a series of explosions destroyed the Piper Alpha oil platform, with 167 men killed and only 61 survivors. It remains the world's worst offshore disaster. Follow the story of how the disaster unfolded.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: This Is BBC TWO
channel.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: A plot of land in Leeds is a potential goldmine, that is if the new owner can obtain planning permission. Dion likes what's on offer at a bungalow in Derby, and Tommy thinks the layout at a south west London flat needs a reconfiguration.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
channel.desc: JB uncovers a book containing a valuable surprise, and Robin saves a wheelbarrow from the scrapheap. But can the team help a family honour their late mum's final wish?

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Gardeners' World
channel.desc: Monty takes salvia cuttings in the Jewel Garden. Adam Frost visits a ceramicist in Kent. Joe Swift heads to an organic flower farm set up as a social enterprise. Plus, a coastal haven planted by a mum to recreate the wild upbringing.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Tournament
channel.desc: Eight contestants compete in a series of fast-paced quiz battles in an attempt to eliminate their opponents from the day's game and walk away with a cash prize.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: A couple look to relocate to the Somerset countryside with the help of Alistair Appleton. They have a budget of ?700,000 to find a rural home with enough land for animals and a glamping site. Away from the hunt, Alistair tries to make Cheddar cheese.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Yellowstone: Wildest Winter to Blazing Summer
channel.desc: Patrick Aryee follows the grizzly bears that are taking a risk with the weather by leaving their winter dens early. Hungry wolves are struggling to bring down their elk prey in the unusually shallow snow. For great grey owls, it is the iciness of the snow that is hampering their hunts.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: Members of the public try and make money out of their antiques.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Every day this week, previous contestants Radzi Chinyanganya, Janet Ellis, Darren Harriott and Suzi Ruffell take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
channel.desc: Michael reaches the pretty Cornish fishing village of St Mawes, now an exclusive holiday destination for connoisseurs of yachts, fine food and luxury hotels. Michael takes to the waves in a glorious classic wooden racing yacht.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
channel.desc: Reality TV star and autism campaigner Christine McGuinness takes on `Coronation Street' actor Colson Smith. Also enjoying the ride, and supplying some much-needed know-how, are antiques experts Irita Marriot and Hettie Jago.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Saving Lives at Sea
channel.desc: In Portaferry, Northern Ireland, the crew face an increasingly urgent search for two kayakers who have been blown out to sea in 50 mile an hour winds. Reports of a missing female swimmer near Selsey lead to a late night search in near total darkness.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Nazis, U-boats and the Battle for the Atlantic
channel.desc: Divers hunt for the wrecks of World War II's longest campaign that lie off Ireland's north west coast, as historians explore the Allied fightback at sea and the human cost of war.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Limbs in the Loch: Catching a Killer
channel.desc: After discovering that Beggs had previously been sentenced to life in prison for murder, but had been freed on appeal, the search for him in relation to the murder of Barry Wallace intensifies.

channel.desc: Piper Alpha burns, and the platform begins to collapse. With 167 men dead and just a handful of survivors, grief turns to fury, and the fight for justice begins back home.

channel.title: Miriam Margolyes Discovers New Zealand

channel.desc: A 999 call comes in from the young son of a windsurfer in trouble; the Mudeford crew battle 80mph winds in an increasingly desperate search.

channel.title: The Great Art Fraud
channel.desc: Art's most sensational fraud. Inigo Philbrick becomes one of the art world's most successful dealers. But there's a secret. He is living lavishly on millions conned from collectors.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Clean It, Fix It
channel.desc: Mark Wright, Maxine Dwyer and Asher Edwards help Alison, a devoted mum, transform her busy one-bedroom flat into a home that feels calm and organised. The space was overwhelmed by toys, limiting Alison's ability to cook, entertain and relax.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Clean It, Fix It
channel.desc: Mark Wright, Tommy Walsh and Maxine Dwyer help Catherine, a widow, tackle the unfinished DIY projects left behind by her late husband.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
channel.desc: A couple cannot sell their home until they have sold their collection. Quality jewellery should attract big bids, but will a new owner be found for Robin's restored chest of drawers?

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Anna Haugh's Big Irish Food Tour
channel.desc: Shayne Ward invites Anna along as he retraces his Irish Traveller roots in County Louth. They meet one of Ireland's last remaining tinsmiths and harvest cabbages at a local farm.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
channel.desc: Aboard the Golden Pass Express, Michael Portillo wends his way in style down steep mountainsides from Interlaken to the Swiss Riviera. In Lausanne, he contends with a knife-wielding robotic arm at a renowned centre of science and technology. Michael is impressed by the robot's skills in the kitchen and witnesses a groundbreaking prosthetic that allows amputees to feel heat and cold.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Yellowstone: Wildest Winter to Blazing Summer
channel.desc: As winter turns to spring, temperatures rise and Yellowstone bursts into life. Beavers feast on new green shoots, baby bison take their first faltering steps and grizzly bear cubs emerge from dens to explore this new green world.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: The team are at Newby Hall, North Yorkshire. Mark Stacey comes across an interesting Clarice Cliff cake plate and Michael Baggott enjoys an ancient Chinese urn. Paul Martin takes in the splendours of the Adams interiors at the Hall.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Every day this week, previous contestants Radzi Chinyanganya, Janet Ellis, Darren Harriott and Suzi Ruffell take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
channel.desc: Michael Portillo nears the end of his railway adventure tracking the rugged coast of South West England. He finishes in the westernmost reaches of England, in the Scillonian archipelago.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Beechgrove Garden
channel.desc: Calum and George are in the fruit cage pruning the gooseberries and removing some of the black currants to make way next year's raspberries. Calum pots up his begonias, and George demonstrates how to train the small fruit trees.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: Sportscene
channel.desc: Kelly Cates presents live coverage of Scotland's World Cup qualifier against Denmark.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
channel.desc: It's the start of the coarse fishing season, and to celebrate Paul and Bob are in the Norfolk Broads to fish in some of East Anglia's most historic and celebrated waterways. As is the way with a trip to the Broads, Paul and Bob do away with the car and instead get around by boat. It's the quintessential Broads experience, although Paul does wonder whether he should have been captain instead of Bob.

channel.title: Dark Waters
channel.desc: A tenacious attorney uncovers a dark secret that connects a growing number of unexplained deaths to one of the world's largest corporations. While trying to expose the truth, he soon finds himself risking his future, his family and his own life.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Panorama
channel.desc: Richard Bilton investigates the high-end jewellery stores - and the man behind them - that left investors who ploughed ?170M into the business with nothing.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Moment of Proof
channel.desc: When the search for a missing woman becomes a murder investigation, a baseball cap and DNA on a discarded beer can help detectives find her killer.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Murder Case
channel.desc: With unprecedented access to the police investigation and criminal trial, the shocking truth of what really happened on the night Tony Parsons disappeared is discovered.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Great Art Fraud
channel.desc: When Inigo Philbrick is exposed as a fraud, he and his reality TV star girlfriend go on the run. As the scale of his crime becomes clear, a global FBI manhunt begins to bring him to justice.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: Duggee has made some delicious pancakes, but the clubhouse is out of honey. It's time for the bees to get busy.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mojo Swoptops
channel.desc: When a lost bird takes a liking to Bo, Mojo must fly it home. However, the journey is stormy, and Bo finds himself needing to take flight as well.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Trevor accidentally spikes himself on a cactus while questing.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings find a magic stick that functions as a Yummy divining rod, but Grizzy steals their stick and finds a Yummy deposit in the savannah. To take control over Grizzy's discovery, the Lemmings set a trap to draw the bear.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
channel.desc: An eclipse prevents the solar panels from supplying the cabin with electricity and Grizzy is disgruntled because he can't watch TV.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons: The Series
channel.desc: Liko, Dot, Roy and Friede have gone to the Crystal Pool and have found Briar. Asking about Terapagos, she shows them the Scarlet Book and explains how it ties to the adventures of her ancestor Heath as he visited Area Zero long ago.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Adam and Joe become animal park tour guides for the day, but have to do exactly what the other one tells them to, much to the visitors' bemusement.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
channel.desc: Nitro and Apollo prank Dynamite by turning her into a singing banana. The other Gladiators have fun behind the scenes and pranking the audience at Sheffield Arena.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Blue Peter
channel.desc: Joel, Abby, Shini and Henry reveal a brand new look for the Blue Peter studio.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: News magazine keeping young viewers up to date with the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Christine's Garden
channel.desc: Christine Walkden's garden blossoms in spring, but she still finds time to help her struggling neighbour Reg and offer tips at an old steam railway line in Yorkshire.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Diary of Anne Frank
channel.desc: German-occupied Amsterdam, 1942. Young teen Anne details how, to escape escalating persecution of Jews, the Franks take refuge with another family in a cramped attic hidden above a small business.

channel.title: Live: Women's Rugby World Cup
channel.desc: Live coverage of Canada v Scotland from the 2025 Women's Rugby World Cup.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Wild
channel.desc: Kedleston Hall is a grand stately home nestled in the Derbyshire countryside. In its grounds lives one of the most elusive of British mammals, the stoat.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC Proms
channel.desc: A galaxy of sound from Britain's brightest young musicians. The National Youth Orchestra of Great Britain and conductor Dalia Stasevska blast off on a celestial musical journey featuring Holst's `The Planets' and John Williams's `Star Wars'.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Radio 2 in the Park
channel.desc: A live whistle-stop tour of the best live music highlights from Saturday daytime at Radio 2 in the Park 2025, including `Stereophonics', Belinda Carlisle, Ronan Keating, `Jessie J', `Kid Creole and The Coconuts', and more.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Radio 2 in the Park
channel.desc: Canadian rock superstar Bryan Adams headlines Saturday at Radio 2 in the Park 2025 in Chelmsford.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Top of the Pops
channel.desc: A look in the BBC vaults to showcase and celebrate the biggest and best performances of 1991, including Right Said Fred, Seal, Mariah Carey, Nirvana, Bryan Adams and The KLF.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Top of the Pops
channel.desc: As the 1990s start to get going, 1991 is the year in which indie kids, ravers, alternative comedians and even a certain grunge band from Seattle hit the charts against the background of recession and a war in the Middle East.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Sound of Metal
channel.desc: Ruben, a drummer, is distraught when he begins losing his hearing. However, things take a turn when he meets Joe, who heads a community comprising of people with hearing impairment.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Great British Railway Journeys
channel.desc: Arriving in Birmingham, Michael Portillo heads to Curzon Street for a tour of the HS2 terminus still under construction. In the Newtown area, he visits the oldest private manufacturing firm in the UK.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Football Interview
channel.desc: Former England captain Wayne Rooney talks to Kelly Somers about his love of musicals, family life and more.

channel.title: This Is BBC TWO
channel.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Take a Hike
channel.desc: Mischievous musician Innes's 8km mountain walk starts with a climb over the lower ridges of Bruach na Frithe in the Cullin range, before following a meandering river with its myriad pools through the Glen of Sligachan.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Christine's Garden
channel.desc: It's late spring and a busy time of the year for horticulturalist Christine Walkden. She has been invited to a tomato weekend in the West Country, where she can indulge in her passion for plant-spotting.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Glorious Gardens from Above
channel.desc: Christine experiments with triangular planting and shares tea and cake with a gardening legend. At RHS Hyde Hall, she shifts rocks with a former student, and it's all aboard a vintage Thames sailing barge for a trip on the Blackwater Estuary.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Witness for the Prosecution
channel.desc: A top-flight barrister attempts to defend murder suspect Leonard Vole, who stands accused of murdering a wealthy widow for the fortune she left behind. Catherine falls in love with a model of Muffin the Mule and David is enchanted by a limited edition book by author JK Rowling.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Every day this week, previous contestants Sian Gibson, Jean Johansson, Iain Stirling and Rav Wilding take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
channel.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on a railway journey around the ragged rocks of the western coast of Wales. He begins on the Victorian Cliff Railway at Aberystwyth, rising above the historic town to take in views over Cardigan Bay.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Global Eye
channel.desc: Bringing forensic journalism from all corners of the world by BBC Eye, the World Service's critically acclaimed investigative unit, and featuring expert global correspondents getting to the heart of the biggest international stories.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mastermind
channel.desc: The search for the nation's Mastermind continues as Clive Myrie tests four more contenders. The specialist subjects are the comedian Bob Mortimer, dolphins and porpoises, the singer Eva Cassidy and the England cricket team under Michael Atherton.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Only Connect
channel.desc: Victoria Coren Mitchell hosts the quiz. It is a close match as a family team of doctors takes on three keen pianists. They face questions related to an embittered former pin-up girl, a robotic dog, a penguin criminal mastermind.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: University Challenge
channel.desc: In another first round match, competition debutants Green Templeton College, Oxford face a team from Cambridge's Darwin College. Amol Rajan asks the questions.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Disaster at Sea: The Piper Alpha Story
channel.desc: With Piper Alpha gone, survivors' evidence becomes key to the truth. The inquiry reveals fatal errors, ignored warnings and failed systems. Will there be justice?

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Upstart Crow
channel.desc: The plague leads Will and his friends to escape to the family home in Stratford. On the way they meet three witches who have some surprising predictions to make about Will's future, leading to a very serious case of house envy.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
channel.desc: Davina McCall rings the bell on a speed-dating event where single hopefuls get to date a stranger they could end up marrying. The only catch? They will not know who they have been matched with until they meet them again on their wedding day.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: MasterChef
channel.desc: It's the fifth and final week of the heats, and another group of home cooks take the first step towards making their culinary dreams a reality.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: This Is BBC TWO
channel.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Clean It, Fix It
channel.desc: Mark Wright, Karla Pryce and Asher Edwards help Robin reclaim his one-bedroom flat from years of accumulated belongings.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
channel.desc: A son faces the tough task of clearing his late mum's home. With JB and Lauren's help, valuable finds go to auction to fund a new beginning - but is he ready to let go?

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Repair Shop
channel.desc: Ruth brings a weather-worn concrete portrait of her late father. Next, Brenton West meets Ian who brings in a silver statuette. Pari from Ormskirk brings in a leather baby hammock. Dom Chinea tackles a flight case once owned by Trevor Bolder.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC News
channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Politics Live
channel.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Impossible
channel.desc: Contestants compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Bridge of Lies
channel.desc: Ross Kemp presents as a team of four work colleagues, Grace, Faye, Ben and Zoe, take on the Bridge of Lies. One by one they all face the bridge, choosing who faces each crossing depending on the question category.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Cornwall: This Fishing Life
channel.desc: It's summer in Newquay. But you wouldn't know it. Cornwall's most popular tourist resort has been in lockdown for months. Reliant on tourism, some are predicting it could be the worst-hit town for Covid-19 in England.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: The show comes from Newby Hall North Yorkshire. Mark Stacey comes across two unusual tie and stick pins and Clare Rawle enthuses about a large collection of toy cars.. Paul Martin enjoys the Victorian wing of Newby Hall.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Every day this week, previous contestants Sian Gibson, Jean Johansson, Iain Stirling and Rav Wilding take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
channel.desc: Michael Portillo continues his railway journey in North Wales, tracking the coastline north from Harlech to skirt the Llyn Peninsula. Beginning on the shifting sands of Morfa Harlech, Michael finds a team of conservationists felling trees.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Hairy Bikers Go West
channel.desc: The Bikers' journey continues, bringing the boys cruising the roads along the River Severn, a region steeped in history and natural beauty. Dave and Si both have personal history in this part of the world and can't wait to discover its flavours.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Digging for Britain
channel.desc: Alice Roberts reveals a Dutch ship sunk by the English, a Cornish Roman fort and a 5,000-year-old Neolithic monument.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: QI XL
channel.desc: Sandi Toksvig talks about rocks, rolls and rock `n' roll. With Bill Bailey, Katy Brand, Eshaan Akbar and Alan Davies.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live at the Apollo
channel.desc: Angela Barnes hosts, introducing comedians Sarah Keyworth and Tim Renkow to the stage.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Saving Lives at Sea
channel.desc: In Portaferry, Northern Ireland, the crew face an increasingly urgent search for two kayakers who have been blown out to sea in 50 mile an hour winds. Reports of a missing female swimmer near Selsey lead to a late night search in near total darkness.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Clemency
channel.desc: Bernadine Williams is a prison warden who, over the years, has been drifting away from her husband while dutifully carrying out executions in a maximum security prison. When she strikes up a unique bond with death-row inmate Anthony Woods, a layer of emotional skin is peeled back, forcing Bernadine to confront the complex-and often contradictory-relationship between good intentions, unrequited desires, and what it means to be sanctioned to kill.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
channel.desc: Three more couples get hitched on Honeymoon Island and leap into their stranded life together. But while it is paradise for some of the honeymooners, one couple fail to ignite, and unwanted visitors threaten to derail another's early spark.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: MasterChef
channel.desc: It's the final heat as the last group of food-obsessed cooks go all out to try to nab one of the last three quarter-final places in this year's competition.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: This Is BBC TWO
channel.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Richie Anderson joins the `Escape to the Country' line up, helping a couple of born and bred Brummies to find the perfect character property on his home turf of the rural Midlands.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
channel.desc: Bee uncovers a perfect painting and JJ restores some handmade sailing boats to help a couple who have overcome illness and are ready to celebrate a golden anniversary in style.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
channel.desc: National treasure Anthea Turner goes up against fresh-faced buddie and antique newbie Darren Harriott in their mighty 1966 Mustang. They join iconic auctioneer Philip Serrell and jewellery superstar Ishy Khan on a tour of Cambridgeshire.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Cornwall: This Fishing Life
channel.desc: Looe once boasted the second largest fishing fleet in Cornwall. For decades it held a reputation for landing some of the freshest fish in the country. There's now just half a dozen full time trawlers, and in 2019 its fish market closed.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: The show omes from Allerton Castle North Yorkshire. Raj Bisram falls for a silver claret jug while David Harper uncovers a Roger Moore signature, and Paul Martin finds out about Harrogate's connection with the last Tsarina of Russia.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Every day this week, previous contestants Sian Gibson, Jean Johansson, Iain Stirling and Rav Wilding take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
channel.desc: Michael Portillo steams through the glorious scenery of the Snowdonia National Park on one of Britain's greatest heritage lines, the Welsh Highland Railway. Stopping off at Beddgelert, Michael takes in the awesome geology.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: SOS: Extreme Rescues
channel.desc: A woman has multiple injuries after falling 20 feet on Wales's highest peak, a child goes missing on a busy beach, and a small team stretcher an injured man over a fast-flowing river.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Grand Tours of Scotland's Rivers
channel.desc: Paul continues his journey down the mighty River Tay, from the white-water rapids of Grandtully through the fair city of Perth to the briny firth. Beneath an ancient oak near Dunkeld, Paul meets a man who plays the music of Niel Gow.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life
channel.desc: Hannah takes a look at the vacuum cleaner, going behind the scenes with Dyson and discovering how the motor in their latest vacuum spins nine times faster than that of a Formula One race car.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Wilderness with Simon Reeve
channel.desc: Simon Reeve battles his way across the Congo, braving thick jungle and tropical swamps in search of the people and the wildlife who make their home in Africa's greatest rainforest.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Limbs in the Loch: Catching a Killer
channel.desc: William Beggs has fled the country and handed himself in to police in Amsterdam, hoping to benefit from their robust extradition laws. While extradition proceedings take place, Strathclyde Police use the time to build a strong case against Beggs.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Unspun World with John Simpson
channel.desc: John Simpson brings his expertise to bear on the most important stories. In discussion with the BBC's range of experts across the world, he uses their unique local knowledge to go beyond the headlines to get to the unspun truth about the world.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: International T20 Cricket
channel.desc: Highlights of the first game of the T20 series between England and South Africa.
